Benchmark.title: Red Hat Universal Base Image 9 Security Benchmark
Benchmark.description: This benchmark provides security guidance for Red Hat Universal Base Image (UBI) 9 containers.

Profile.title: Standard Security Profile
Profile.description: Standard security profile for UBI9 containers with basic hardening recommendations.

Rule.title: Ensure telnet is not installed
Rule.description: This rule checks that the telnet package is not installed in UBI 9.
Rule.rationale: Telnet is a cleartext protocol and should be avoided for security reasons.
Rule.fixtext: Remove the telnet package with 'microdnf remove telnet'.

Rule.title: Ensure curl-minimal is not installed
Rule.description: This rule checks that the curl package is not installed in UBI 9.
Rule.rationale: Curl is a cleartext protocol and should be avoided for security reasons.
Rule.fixtext: Remove the Curl package with 'microdnf remove curl'.
